SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_ISSUFFIXACADEMIC_DOCTORAL
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_ISSUFFIXACADEMIC_DOCTORAL(@SUFFIXCODEID uniqueidentifier) returns bit with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @RESULT bit = 0
SELECT @RESULT = CASE COUNT(sp.ID) WHEN 0 then 0 else 1 end FROM dbo.USR_SUFFIXPROPERTIES sp WHERE sp.SUFFIXCODEID = @SUFFIXCODEID AND sp.ISACADEMICSUFFIX = 1
IF @RESULT IS NULL SET @RESULT = 0
return @RESULT end
